intro: Psychotria costivenia var. altorum, commonly known as the tall psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its slender, erect stems and opposite, elliptical leaves. It produces small, clustered flowers that are typically white or pale green, with prominent yellow stamens. This variant is often found in moist, shaded habitats within tropical forests.
